Package main.gamesystem

Class SetUp

java.lang.Object
main.gamesystem.SetUp
public class SetUp extends Object
Class SetUp controls additional logic that requires to Class GameEnvironment.

  • Method Details

    • checkRegex

      public void checkRegex(String input, String REGEX, String message) throws IllegalInputException
      method that checks whether an input string satisfies the requirements for each situation. This method throws IllegalInputException if requirement is not met.
      Parameters:
      input - input string to be checked.
      REGEX - A regular expression expressing the requirements for each situation.
      message - extra message to show when exception happens.
      Throws:
      IllegalInputException - (Optional) if input does not match to REGEX

    • reducedStamina

      public void reducedStamina(Athlete[] athletes, boolean lose)
      Control athletes stamina. Loss more stamina if player lose a match.
      Parameters:
      athletes - player's athletes
      lose - true if athlete lost a match

    • refillStamina

      public void refillStamina(Athlete[] athletes)
      Control athletes stamina. Refill athletes' stamina full.
      Parameters:
      athletes - player's athletes

    • event

      public boolean event(double percentage)
      event method to trigger random events
      Parameters:
      percentage - double value representing the upper bound
      Returns:
      random double value that does not exceed 100

    • randomInt

      public static int randomInt(int bound)
      random method to get any random integer number
      Parameters:
      bound - int value representing the upper bound of random case
      Returns:
      random integer value

    • randomInt

      public static int randomInt(int origin, int bound)
      random method to get any random integer number
      Parameters:
      origin - int value representing the origin of random case
      bound - int value representing the upper bound of random case
      Returns:
      random integer value
